text: Striped Trip () is a 1961 Soviet comedy movie directed by Vladimir Fetin.«Ленфильм» на 22 года получил в пользование свою «Золотую коллекцию»Полосатый рейс It stars Alexey Gribov, Ivan Dmitriyev, and Margarita Nazarova. == Actors == * Alexey Gribov as Vasily Vasilyevich, captain * Ivan Dmitriyev as Oleg Petrovich, chief mate * Margarita Nazarova as Marianna Andreevna, barmaid * Yevgeny Leonov as Gleb Savelievich Shuleykin * Vladimir Belokurov as Alexey Stepanovich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1961 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Striped Trip
